## discoverInstalledExtensions {#symbol-function-discoverinstalledextensions}

```{.ts filename="TypeScript"}
function discoverInstalledExtensions(projectDir, options?): Promise<InstalledExtension[]>;
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/filesystem/discovery.ts:82](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/b137ce01c347ae00b9119bd3b64f63ca147770fe/packages/core/src/filesystem/discovery.ts#L82)

Discover all installed extensions in a project.

Scans the \_extensions directory for extensions in both formats:

- \_extensions/owner/name/\_extension.yml (with owner)
- \_extensions/name/\_extension.yml (without owner)

### Parameters

| Parameter    | Type                                                                   | Description            |
| ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `projectDir` | `string`                                                               | Project root directory |
| `options`    | [`DiscoveryOptions`](filesystem.qmd#symbol-interface-discoveryoptions) | Discovery options      |

### Returns

`<code>Promise&lt;<a href="filesystem.qmd#symbol-interface-installedextension" style="text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-style: dashed; text-decoration-thickness: 1px; text-decoration-color: currentColor;">InstalledExtension</a>[]&gt;</code>`{=html}

Array of installed extensions

### Example

```{.typescript filename="TypeScript"}
const extensions = await discoverInstalledExtensions("./my-project");
for (const ext of extensions) {
  console.log(`${ext.id.owner ?? ""}/${ext.id.name}: ${ext.manifest.version}`);
}
```
